courses.whatLearn: Master modern web development from scratch including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, responsive design, and basic backend concepts. Build real projects and get ready for freelance or job opportunities.

courses.title: Beginner Adobe Illustrator For Graphic Design
courses.description: Learn Adobe Illustrator from zero to professional level. Create logos, icons, illustrations, and vector graphics used in real design projects.
courses.whatLearn: Master vector tools, create professional logos and illustrations, work with colors, typography, and export for print/web.

courses.title: Starting SEO As Your Home Based Business
courses.description: Turn SEO into a profitable home business. Learn keyword research, on-page optimization, link building, and client acquisition strategies.
courses.whatLearn: Complete SEO fundamentals, rank websites on Google, attract clients, and build a sustainable online business.

courses.title: Beginner Adobe Illustrator For Graphic Design
courses.description: Comprehensive beginner course covering all essential Adobe Illustrator tools and techniques for graphic design.
courses.whatLearn: Create stunning vector graphics, logos, and illustrations with confidence using industry-standard tools.

courses.title: It Statistics Data Science And Business Analysis
courses.description: Learn data science, statistics, and business analysis tools to make data-driven decisions.
courses.whatLearn: Analyze data effectively, use statistical methods, and apply insights to real business problems.

courses.title: Starting SEO As Your Home Based Business
courses.description: Complete guide to starting and growing an SEO business from home with practical strategies.
courses.whatLearn: SEO techniques, client management, and scaling your home-based digital marketing business.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript Programming Course
courses.description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript concepts and modern development practices.
courses.whatLearn: ES6+, asynchronous programming, functional programming, and building complex applications.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the core principles of UI/UX design and create user-centered digital experiences.
courses.whatLearn: User research, wireframing, prototyping, and designing intuitive interfaces.

courses.title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
courses.description: Complete digital marketing training covering all major channels and strategies.
courses.whatLearn: SEO, social media marketing, email campaigns, PPC advertising, and analytics.
